soot.jimple.infoflow.methodSummary.generator

Class SummaryGeneratorConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.InfoflowConfiguration
      • soot.jimple.infoflow.methodSummary.generator.SummaryGeneratorConfiguration

  • public class SummaryGeneratorConfiguration
extends soot.jimple.infoflow.InfoflowConfiguration
    Configuration class for the data flow summary generator
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

      • setAndroidPlatformDir

        public void setAndroidPlatformDir(String androidPlatformDir)
        Sets the directory in which the Android platform JARs are located. This option must be set when generating summariers for classes inside an APK file.
        Parameters:
        androidPlatformDir - The directory in which the Android platform JARs are located

      • getAndroidPlatformDir

        public String getAndroidPlatformDir()
        Gets the directory in which the Android platform JARs are located. This option must be set when generating summariers for classes inside an APK file.
        Returns:
        The directory in which the Android platform JARs are located

      • setLoadFullJAR

        public void setLoadFullJAR(boolean loadFullJAR)
        Sets whether the target JAR file shall be loaded fully before the analysis starts. More precisely, this instructs StubDroid to not only explicitly load the target classes, but put the whole target JAR into Soot's process directory. This is, for instance, useful when analyzing all classes derived from a certain superclass.
        Parameters:
        loadFullJAR - True if the target JAR file shall be fully loaded before performing the analysis, otherwise false.

      • getLoadFullJAR

        public boolean getLoadFullJAR()
        Gets whether the target JAR file shall be loaded fully before the analysis starts. More precisely, this instructs StubDroid to not only explicitly load the target classes, but put the whole target JAR into Soot's process directory. This is, for instance, useful when analyzing all classes derived from a certain superclass.
        Returns:
        True if the target JAR file shall be fully loaded before performing the analysis, otherwise false.

      • setExcludes

        public void setExcludes(Set<String> excludes)
        Sets the set of classes to be excluded from the analysis. Use pkg.* to exclude all classes in package "pkg"
        Parameters:
        excludes - The set of classes and packages to be excluded

      • getExcludes

        public Set<String> getExcludes()
        Gets the set of classes to be excluded from the analysis.
        Returns:
        The set of classes and packages to be excluded

      • getSummarizeHashCodeEquals

        public boolean getSummarizeHashCodeEquals()
        Gets whether hashCode() and equals() methods should also be summarized
        Returns:
        True if hashCode() and equals() methods shall be summarized, false otherwise

      • setSummarizeHashCodeEquals

        public void setSummarizeHashCodeEquals(boolean summarizeHashCodeEquals)
        Sets whether hashCode() and equals() methods should also be summarized
        Parameters:
        summarizeHashCodeEquals - True if hashCode() and equals() methods shall be summarized, false otherwise

      • setRepeatCount

        public void setRepeatCount(int repeatCount)
        Sets the number of time the analysis of every class shall be repeated. This is useful for measurements and evaluations.
        Parameters:
        repeatCount - The number of time the analysis of every class shall be repeated

      • getRepeatCount

        public int getRepeatCount()
        Gets the number of time the analysis of every class shall be repeated. This is useful for measurements and evaluations.
        Returns:
        The number of time the analysis of every class shall be repeated

      • setValidateResults

        public void setValidateResults(boolean validateResults)
        Sets whether the computed data flows shall be validated
        Parameters:
        validateResults - True if the computed data flows shall be validated, otherwise false

      • getValidateResults

        public boolean getValidateResults()
        Gets whether the computed data flows shall be validated
        Returns:
        True if the computed data flows shall be validated, otherwise false

      • getApplySummariesOnTheFly

        public boolean getApplySummariesOnTheFly()
        Gets whether the summary generator shall apply the generated summaries on the fly. With this option enabled, the classes to be processed will be sorted according to their dependencies.When processing the second class, it will apply the summary of the first class.
        Returns:
        True if the generated summaries shall be applied on the fly, false otherwise

      • setApplySummariesOnTheFly

        public void setApplySummariesOnTheFly(boolean applySummariesOnTheFly)
        Sets whether the summary generator shall apply the generated summaries on the fly. With this option enabled, the classes to be processed will be sorted according to their dependencies.When processing the second class, it will apply the summary of the first class.
        Parameters:
        applySummariesOnTheFly - True if the generated summaries shall be applied on the fly, false otherwise

      • getAdditionalSummaryDirectories

        public Set<String> getAdditionalSummaryDirectories()
        Gets the directories in which the summary generator shall look for existing summaries to integrate
        Returns:
        The directories from which existing summaries shall be loaded

      • addAdditionalSummaryDirectory

        public void addAdditionalSummaryDirectory(String directory)
        Adds an additional directory in which the summary generator shall look for existing summaries to speed up the generation of new ones
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory from which to load the summaries

      • getClassSummaryTimeout

        public long getClassSummaryTimeout()
        Gets the timeout after which StubDroid shall abort generating summaries for a single class
        Returns:
        The timeout, in seconds, after which StubDroid shall abort generating summaries for a single class

      • setClassSummaryTimeout

        public void setClassSummaryTimeout(long classSummaryTimeout)
        Sets the timeout after which StubDroid shall abort generating summaries for a single class
        Parameters:
        classSummaryTimeout - The timeout, in seconds, after which StubDroid shall abort generating summaries for a single class
